title: Reformation's Huge Winter Sale Is Live—Here's Everything I'm Shopping
description: Don't wait another minute; these styles will sell out quickly.
excerpt: Thousands of bestsellers are up to 50 percent off.
text: Here’s some great news to brighten up the seasonal gloom: Reformation’s annual Winter Sale is back, bringing with it record-low deals on thousands of bestsellers.Everything from cozy cashmere sweaters to chic New Year’s Eve-ready dresses are up to 50 percent off right now. Even celebrity-approved styles like Kendall Jenner’s Charchi mini skirt, Taylor Swift’s chunky Agatha loafers, and Jennifer Aniston’s dainty Kourtney Dress are discounted in a few colorways—though you’ll need to act fast since sizes are flying off shelves.Personally, I’ll be clicking “purchase” on a slew of basics that have been sitting in my cart for months. Example A: These ultra-flattering high-rise jeans (now $84) that are perfect to pair with a turtleneck and suede coat this season. For the office, I’m also eyeing these classic trousers (down to just over $100), this cashmere mini dress (now 40 percent off), and this vintage-inspired crepe jacket (now under $200) that will look effortless styled with some cigarette pants and ballet flats. Reformation rarely has sales, and with deals this steep, you’d be remiss not to stock up. html:
Here’s some great news to brighten up the seasonal gloom: Reformation’s annual Winter Sale is back, bringing with it record-low deals on thousands of bestsellers.

Everything from cozy cashmere sweaters to chic New Year’s Eve-ready dresses are up to 50 percent off right now. Even celebrity-approved styles like Kendall Jenner’s Charchi mini skirt, Taylor Swift’s chunky Agatha loafers, and Jennifer Aniston’s dainty Kourtney Dress are discounted in a few colorways—though you’ll need to act fast since sizes are flying off shelves.

Personally, I’ll be clicking “purchase” on a slew of basics that have been sitting in my cart for months. Example A: These ultra-flattering high-rise jeans (now $84) that are perfect to pair with a turtleneck and suede coat this season. For the office, I’m also eyeing these classic trousers (down to just over $100), this cashmere mini dress (now 40 percent off), and this vintage-inspired crepe jacket (now under $200) that will look effortless styled with some cigarette pants and ballet flats.

Reformation rarely has sales, and with deals this steep, you’d be remiss not to stock up. To save you precious time scrolling, rush-buy these 21 incredible sale finds, below, before someone else beats you to them.
